replies.body:
It was a long time coming... 
Tbh it should have been released last week, when there was still hype.
But that is the past, and this skin is about the future.

It is truly an amazing skin
The quality of Legendary skins (PROJECT: ASHE: etc) has taken a huge leap forward.
Well done Riot! Truly.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Nerfed first then released, just to keep people happy, muahaha.
I've had PFE since Seaon 3 but I don't have the new Icon?
Same to {{summoner:3}} to go to support for it xd
i got the PULSEFIRE EZREAL, but i cant lock the new icon, whyyyyyyyyyy{{champion:81}}
